title: KupaCrypto
author: KupaCrypto
content: Manchester United won city yesterday to move to within a point behind Manchester city and six points behind league leaders Arsenal who play Tottenham later this evening.With what we have seen from Manchester United I now believe the can be considered a serious title contenders for this season based on current form winning nine matches on the bounce.It's been long time we saw this type of Atmosphere in the theatre of dreams and should this Manchester United form continue I see them closing the gap on arsenal and if arsenal it's not careful Manchester United will put pressure on them and don't forget it's six points and a win for Manchester United against arsenal later this month might prove a key factor in the race to the title for both Manchester United and arsenal. Tho it's too early to talk about Manchester United been title contenders.

comments.author: Moontary
comments.body: We need to see what happens over the distance, as long as United is good

comments.author: KupaCrypto
comments.body: Quote from: Moontary on January 15, 2023, 02:22:47 PMWe need to see what happens over the distance, as long as United is goodThe match against arsenal on Sunday shows that Manchester United doesn't have have what it takes yet to be considered serious tittle contenders, The gunners dominated them in almost all Everything and were deserved winners, I think if arsenal can also prove that against a Manchester city side then the league title is theirs and for now the league title is arsenal's to loose.
